meanings.definition: A group of proteins in the blood that play a role in the immune response.
meanings.sent1: The properdins in our blood help fight off infections.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study properdins to understand how our bodies defend against germs.
meanings.sent3: The properdins had a meeting to discuss how to protect the body from invaders.
meanings.sent4: The properdins stood guard like vigilant soldiers, ready to battle any intruders.
meanings.sent5: Imagine the properdins as tiny superheroes, swooping in to save the day when germs attack.

meanings.definition: To enhance the activity of the immune system.
meanings.sent1: Eating fruits and vegetables can properdins your immune system.
meanings.sent2: Exercise can help properdins your body's defenses against illnesses.
meanings.sent3: The doctor advised the patient to properdins their immune system by getting enough rest.
meanings.sent4: Laughter has the power to properdins your immune system, so don't forget to smile!
meanings.sent5: Properdins your immune system like a coach training a team for the big game, preparing it to win against sickness.
